root.name: tint()
root.description: Sets the fill value for displaying images. Images can be tinted to specified colors or made transparent by setting the alpha.
root.syntax: tint(gray) tint(gray, alpha) tint(value1, value2, value3) tint(value1, value2, value3, alpha) tint(color)

parameter.label: gray
parameter.description: int or float: any valid number

parameter.label: alpha
parameter.description: int or float: opacity of the image

parameter.label: value1
parameter.description: int or float: red or hue value

parameter.label: value2
parameter.description: int or float: green or saturation value

parameter.label: value3
parameter.description: int or float: blue or brightness value

parameter.label: color
parameter.description: color: any value of the color datatype
